Description
Interface to index entries for alphabetically structured indices.
Keywords
index entries, alphabetically structured index

Class 'azIndexEntry'

Description
Interface to index entries whose first letter is important and used by their index (of class azIndex) to structure the page.
Superclasses

Methods

Returns: the first letter of the name of this index entry.
